name: The Frighteningly Untitled Game
description:
Small game made for Potat0s Game Jam Spéciale : 4 heures de cuisson

Jam duration : 4 hours

Jam theme : "Invisible"

Kill all ghosts on the map to complete the game. You can use a ghost detection tool to temporary reveal them.

To avoid scrolling issues with down and spacebar inputs, please either:

- use Fullscreen mode in itch.io

- play the game here: https://sonnungr.ynh.fr/games/Potat0s_Jam_4h/

Font used for title screen: 

night_harm par Jonathan Harris (www.jshcreates.com)

Source code (GDevelop 5): https://sonnungr.ynh.fr/games/the_frighteningly_untilted_game_src.zip
